title: Pyrex (2) 7201 4 Cup Glass Dishes & (2) 7201-PC 4 Cup Loring Pink Lids

description: This set includes Pyrex (2) 7201 4 Cup Glass Dishes & (2) 7201-PC 4 Cup Loring Pink Lids. These Pyrex 7201 storage containers are made from high quality, non-porous glass that won't absorb food odors, flavors, or stains. These containers have a simple and elegant design that allows them to be used seamlessly with any dining set. The glass bowls are clear so the user can easily see the contents without having to open anything. The 7201 containers are perfect for cooking, serving, storing, or travel and have a capacity of 4 cups. These glass dishes are microwave, refrigerator, freezer, and dishwasher safe. The vessels are made in Egypt and Turkey. These storage containers are compatible with the Pyrex 7201-PC plastic lids which can be purchased in a variety of colors.
